profile:
We are a proffesional Design and Build Landscape Contractor.  We service the Western Toronto, From Etobicoke to Hamilton and beyond.  We take pride in the work we do, and spend time with each an every potential client to ensure the final outcome meets their expectations.  We are not your discount Landscaper, we are meticulous, and set high standards for ourselves.  

We offer Landscape Design, Contruction, and Lighting.  We take on jobs from as small as walkways to as large as complete backyard makeovers.  We have Finished carpenters on staff, so consider us your one stop shop for all your outdoor needs, from decks to interlock patio's, flagstone, to complete outdoor (12v) lighting systems.  

We look forward to hearing from you.  

Lou'ay & Mark

profile:
We Design, Construct and Maintain outdoor spaces that leave you breathless.

We are Ontario's leading landscaping and construction company, based in Toronto. We pride ourselves in providing professional, accurate and friendly service. We always assure 100% satisfaction to every customer, with quality work that lasts - for years and years of enjoyment.

We will help you with individual design ideas, materials, location recommendations & anything else needed, to get your landscaping project started.

All work is performed in an ethical and patient - yet timely - manner. And the quality is proudly guaranteed for up to 5 years.

profile:
Solda Pools is an award winning, industry leading, turnkey custom pool builder serving the GTA area. They are family owned and operated since 1984. They provide a full turnkey package with their own in-house staff from design, through construction and finally to fully servicing the pool.
Our Services Include:
* Inground Swimming Pools, Inground Spas & Hot Tubs
* Full Inground Swimming Pool Service
* Custom Designed Inground Pools
* Stone Coping and Pattern Borders
* Pattern Concrete, Flagstone or Interlock Decking
* Water Falls
* Stone Walkways
* Inground Fiberglass Spa and Custom Concrete Spas
* Wrought Iron or Cedar Fencing
* Cedar Cabanas
* Gazebos, Pergolas and Arbors

Areas Serviced: Aurora, Barrie, Brampton, Brooklin, Burlington, Caledon, Collingwood, Etobicoke, Georgetown, Guelph, Hamilton, King City, Kitchener, Markham, Milton, Mississauga, Muskoka, Newmarket, North York, Oakville, Oshawa, Pickering, Richmond Hill, Scarborough, Thornhill, Toronto, Vaughan, Waterloo, Woodbridge

profile: At Master spas of Toronto, we have helped thousands of families escape their hectic lives. Whether by designing your perfect backyard outdoor oasis or your ultimate games room, let our knowledgeable staff provide solutions that will comfort and pamper you. We choose to offer our customers an unparalleled selection and value from a host of top brands which can be readily seen by visiting any of our Ontario warehouse showroom locations in Kitchener, Waterloo, Mississauga, Toronto or Barrie. With over 35 different spa models on display you will never have to buy from a picture. Buying wholesale direct gives our customers the best value and you can always rest assured that your purchase will be backed by the expertise and support of our service staff.

profile: Have you ever had daydreams about ending your hectic day by coming home to a relaxing and soothing environment? At Backyard Retreat Home and Leisure, our goal is for you to look no further than your own backyard for the perfect getaway. We offer the highest quality products and services on the market today. We are proud suppliers of Canada’s leading brands of hot tubs, swim spas, pools, patio furniture, BBQ’s and outdoor living products. Stop into one of our showrooms  today where our expert team will gladly get you into the backyard of your dreams at an affordable price. We are your One-Stop-Shop to make your dreams a reality and our customer’s satisfaction is our number one goal!

profile:
ELP Landscapes is a woman-led company spearheaded by Cheryl Cichon. 
In every project, she brings extensive experience in the construction industry and an innovative industry-leading approach to professional project management.

Professionalism:
A high degree of professionalism is imbued in every aspect of our work and is a central pillar of who we are and how our staff conduct themselves on-site. 
Ask us about our new GPS-equipped trucks and why it makes a difference in ELP projects.

Building Relationships:
We pride ourselves on being transparent and putting an emphasis on communication. 
Our partnerships are built on commitment, confidence, dependability, and honesty.

Project Management:
From the design phase, to when the space is ready for you to enjoy , we put project management first. 
Doing things the ELP way means that regardless of project scale, we hold ourselves accountable and aim to be on time, on budget, and on track.

Quality We Stand By:
Premium and long-lasting materials, industry veterans and quality workmanship, and an unrivalled management process. 
ELP-finished projects are held at the highest standard of quality and sophistication.

Give us a call - 416-748-1982

profile:
We are an award-winning luxury pool company that specializes in designing and building your custom outdoor oasis.

We are a full service pool company with 47 years of experience in transforming back yards. 
We’ll install, repair or renovate any type of pool. Concrete, vinyl, fiberglass and steel pools. 
We offer a wide range of services to both builders and homeowners. From design and build projects to delivery of pool chemicals and weekly service. 

Our area of expertise is concrete pools and water features working for both the homeowner and on commercial projects. 
Our experience lies in our name G3 Pool and Spa, we are 3rd generation pool builders and proud to say we’ve been at the forefront of this every changing industry for almost 5 decades. 
Our experience gives us a competitive advantage. 

Building refinements which we’ve developed, allowing us to build the highest quality pools and spas for less money. 
What does that mean for our customers? 
Unparalleled quality, unmatched price and the best customer service in the business.

Working Hours
Mon. – Fri.: 8:00AM – 6:00PM
Sat. – Sun.: 9:00AM – 4:00PM

Give us a call - 416-251-6549

profile: For over 80 years Betz Pools has been Ontario’s premium designer and builder of custom in-ground concrete & vinyl pools and spas. We also specialize in pool renovation, landscaping, pool service & repairs and are an authorized dealer for Generac standby generators. Betz Pools is now the leading source for turn-key Total Backyard Design Projects and is proud to have scores of regional and national awards to its credit. Betz also operates a swimming pool and spa supplies store with water testing, chemicals, pool toys, accessories, acrylic spas, barbecues and everything you need for backyard fun.

services: Swimming pool & spa design and construction ● Landscape design and construction ● Total backyard project design and construction ● Pool & spa renovation ● Indoor pool design and construction ● Pool & spa opening & closing, weekly service, leak detection and repairs ● Turn-key project management ● Permit applications
specialities: Superior “Dry Gunite” process on custom concrete pools, spas & water features ● Superior “X-brace” construction on custom vinyl pools ● Premium Pebble Crete and selection of crushed aggregate interior finishes ● Selection of unique glass and porcelain tiles ● Proprietary techniques for infinity, zero edge and perimeter overflow pools & spas ● Custom tanning shelves/toddler play areas, underwater benches & swimouts ● Finest quality Wiarton Eramosa flagstone for coping, patios and ledgerock walls ● Selection of premium materials for patios & decks (natural flagstone, architectural stamped concrete, acid etched concrete, interlocking stone/brick, Ipe hardwood) ● Custom rock features, sheer descent waterfalls and water accents ● Leading-edge design, craftsmanship and materials for custom structures (cabanas, outdoor kitchens, pergolas, shade structures, outdoor living rooms, patio walkouts, landscaping screens, retaining walls) ● Unique custom design and materials for railings, fences & gates (glass, Ipe hardwood, cedar, composites, wrought iron) ● Custom built-in natural gas fire features ● Custom irrigation and LED night lighting systems ● State-of-the-art Jandy control systems

profile:
Award Winning Swimming Pool Service Company and Retail Store. Specializing in liner replacement, safety covers, equipment replacement and water chemistry. Total Tech Pools was started in 1991 primarily as a pool service company. Many of the original staff came from other pool companies and many are still with us today. Total Tech Pools performs all types of repairs, restorations, and maintenance on pools including liner replacement, openings/closings, equipment installation and repair, leak detection and complete new pool installations.

In 1996 a retail store was opened and in 2001 a larger facility was opened in Oakville. Currently Total Tech Pools operates a store in Oakville , ON, Kingston, ON and Montreal, QC. We offer a full line of chemicals, equipment, accessories and many other supplies for your pool at very affordable prices. Total Tech Pools prides itself on providing honest and fair service and places a very strong emphasis on education and training.

We are very proud to have received the Small Business of the Year Award in 2009. We truly appreciate the support from our customers, staff, suppliers and other partners for helping us earn this prestigious award.

AWARD WINNING SERVICE TEAM
Our award winning Service Team has been serving customers for 20 years. At Total Tech, we pride ourselves on fair, knowledgeable, and honest service at terrific prices. To experience our service is to understand what sets us apart from the rest. We encourage you to book your experience today.
service_area: Oakville, Burlington, Mississauga, Milton, Georgetown, Brampton.
products:
We carry a full line of pool and spa products with quality and value in mind. All our products have been carefully researched in order to provide the best products available at optimum prices. Total Tech Pools and Spas is located at 1380 Speers Rd in Oakville.

We carry a full line of pool related products:

    Liquid Chlorine (Sodium Hypochlorite)
    Pool and Spa Chemicals
    Accessories and Maintenance Products
    Pool Toys and Games
    Have a very well stocked Parts Department
    Various Equipment (pumps, filters, heaters, sanitation systems, automation)
We have a fully functional and landscaped pool at our Renovation Showroom next door which will help you visualize liners, landscaping options, lighting options and equipment.
Outdoor Furniture
services:
Total Tech Pool & Spa offer most, if not all, pool/spa related services ranging from professional openings & closings, pool liner replacements & restorations, leak detection & repair, equipment installation & repair, to weekly pool maintenance service.
POOL INSPECTION:
    A visit to the home by one of our expertly trained staff members
    A full written report which details the current condition of the pool surface, equipment and foundation.
    The report will outline anything that is not functional or up to code and provide the approximate cost to fix/ replace these dysfunctional parts.
    The report will give any additional recommendations such as safety hazards in the backyard and pool accessories (ie. winter covers, diving boards, slides, fencing, etc).

POOL MAINTENANCE
    Chemical balancing
    Water testing
    Vacuuming
    Leaf Skimming
    Equipment Maintenance

POOL REPAIRS
Our technicians are trained and experienced in a variety of pool related repairs and are backed up with vast technical resources and an extensive parts department. We will identify the problem and advise you on corrective measures and if applicable how to prevent recurrence.
POOL RENOVATIONS/ BACKYARD LANDSCAPING
Total Tech, either independently or in conjunction with our landscaping firm, Rosa and Rosa, can completely transform your backyard and pool.
POOL LEAK DETECTION
We utilize a variety of methods to locate leaks including pressure testing, sonar detection, and diving. In most cases we can isolate a leak to a very small area.
POOL EQUIPMENT INSTALLATION
POOL LINER REPLACEMENT
Total Tech Pools and Leisure is your complete pool service provider.
